no_bus_description: You haven't been assigned to a bus yet. Please contact the transport administrator.
live_tracking_description: Tap the button below to start live tracking. Students will be able to see your location in real-time.
stop_tracking_description: Are you sure you want to stop live tracking? Students will no longer see your location.
button_heading_start: Tap below to start broadcasting your location to students.
location_request_description: BusSafar needs access to your location to broadcast your position to students.
logout_description: Are you sure you want to log out?
password_error_length: New password must be at least 6 characters
password_success: Your password has been changed successfully
welcome_login_sub: Track your university bus in real-time
contact_admin_txt: Contact your administrator for account access
no_bus_description_student: You haven't been assigned to a bus yet. Please contact your university transport office.
tap_bus_card_description: Tap on your bus card to view detailed information and live location tracking when the driver activates it.
